item.title: Ricky Martin Performs “Livin’ La Vida Loca” and Accepts Latin Icon Award at 2025 MTV VMAs: “We Just Want to Break Boundaries”
item.description: J Balvin and Jessica Simpson presented Martin with the inaugural honor.
